{"id":1654248849,"question_id":190,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1749086917,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1654248849/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Bits","memory":"7.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    uint32_t reverseBits(uint32_t n) {\n        uint32_t result = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < 32; i++) {\n            result <<= 1;        // Make space for the new bit\n            result |= (n & 1);   // Add the last bit of n\n            n >>= 1;             // Shift n right to get the next bit\n        }\n        return result;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-bits","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":193}
